mapper.update: update FDA_MONITOR_SPOT set STATION_SPOT_ID = #{stationSpotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPOT_CODE = #{spotCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTRUMENT_TYPE = #{instrumentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEVATION = #{elevation,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BACKGOUND_VALUE = #{backgoundValue,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STATION_SIDE = #{stationSide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USAGE_TYPE = #{usageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, STATION_SPOT_ID, SPOT_CODE, INSTRUMENT_TYPE, ELEVATION, BACKGOUND_VALUE, STATION_SIDE, USAGE_TYPE, REMARKS from FDA_MONITOR_SPOT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, STATION_SPOT_ID, SPOT_CODE, INSTRUMENT_TYPE, ELEVATION, BACKGOUND_VALUE, STATION_SIDE, USAGE_TYPE, REMARKS from FDA_MONITOR_SPOT
